mdxplain
  • Feature Types
  • View page source

Feature TypesÔÉÅ

Feature type implementations for molecular dynamics analysis.

This module provides concrete implementations of feature types for calculating distances and contacts from MD trajectories. These feature types can be used with the FeatureData container for analysis workflows.

  • Feature Type: Contacts
    • Feature Type: Contact Services
    • Feature Type: Contacts Data
    • Feature Type: Contact Calculator
    • Feature Type: Contact Calculator Analysis
  • Feature Type: Coordinates
    • Feature Type: Coordinates Services
    • Feature Type: Coordinates Data
    • Feature Type: Coordinates Calculator
    • Feature Type: Coordinates Calculator Analysis
  • Feature Type: Distances
    • Feature Type: Distances Services
    • Feature Type: Distances Data
    • Feature Type: Distance Calculator
    • Feature Type: Distance Calculator Analysis
  • Feature Type: DSSP
    • Feature Type: DSSP Helper
    • Feature Type: DSSP Services
    • Feature Type: DSSP Data
    • Feature Type: DSSP Calculator
    • Feature Type: DSSP Calculator Analysis
  • Feature Type: Helpers
    • Feature Type: Calculator Compute Helper
    • Feature Type: Calculator Stat Helper
    • Feature Type: Feature Shape Helper
  • Feature Type: Interfaces
    • Feature Type: Interface Analysis Service Base
    • Feature Type: Interface Calculator Base
    • Feature Type: Interface Feature Type Base
    • Feature Type: Interface Feature Type Meta
